meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brave.
meanings.sent1: Her braveness in facing her fears inspired others to be courageous.
meanings.sent2: His braveness during the fire saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's braveness in trying new foods made her family laugh.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's braveness was a shield against the enemy's attacks.
meanings.sent5: The braveness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building will never be forgotten.

meanings.sent1: The braveness of the knight in rescuing the princess was celebrated throughout the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: She showed her braveness by standing up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's braveness in stealing nuts from the bird feeder amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The braveness of the explorer venturing into the unknown jungle was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The braveness of the astronaut walking on the moon was a giant leap for mankind.
